title: ZZX-BBC (BlackBerry Communicator)
blurb: LoRa mesh communicator with E2EE. Text, email relay, voice/video, and file transfer from a BlackBerry-like device across Wi-Fi, Mesh/LoRa, and GSM/5G gateways.
description: ZZX-BBC is a ZZX-Labs in-house communication stack spanning software, firmware, hardware, and a companion web console. It provides end-to-end encrypted messaging, email relay when a gateway is present, adaptive voice/video, file transfer, mesh routing over LoRa with region-compliant parameters, and gateway backhaul via Wi-Fi/Ethernet/Cellular. Devices are provisioned from a seed (X25519/Ed25519 subkeys), support QR pairing, signed OTA firmware, and privacy-first diagnostics. Use responsibly and in compliance with applicable spectrum regulations.
